api_list.name: Get One Pair
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/binance/market/ltc/btc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/{exchange}/market/{base}/{quote}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: signal by strategy
api_list.description:
receive candle (or exchange) data and returns signal calculated by strategy.
If you do not send ohlcv data, you need to send the following informations in request body:

- exchange code
- symbol (base currency / quote currency)
-  timeframe 
- parameters (used from strategy, blank for default)

api_list.name: Get Pairs
api_list.description: Get coin pairs (base coin and quote coin) available from exchange
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/mercado/markets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/{exchange}/markets"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Candle data
api_list.description:
Return data from last 100 candles from a pair by an exchange in a determinate timeframe.
A list of exchanges and pairs available can be obtained using another endpoints from API. 
From timeframes, have a list of determinate values that can be used:
- 1m
- 5m
- 15m
- 30m
-1h
- 2h
- 4h
- 1d
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/crex24/market/rdct/btc/timeframe/1h/candles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchange/{exchange}/market/{base}/{quote}/timeframe/{timeframe}/candles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Strategy Parameters
api_list.description: return a list of accept parameters for a strategy and your default values
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/strategy/rsi/parameter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/strategy/{strategy}/parameter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Prices
api_list.description: Get price data (low, high, bid, ask, last and volumes) from a pair on an exchange

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get One Strategy
api_list.description: Returns only the strategy indicated in path parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/strategy/rsi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com/v1/strategy/{strategy}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criptobot-br.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
